data.name: nightshift
data.detailed_description:
full control system

Great news for you: Now you can use even more game controllers to play nightshift. Your options include MFi, PlayStation DualShock 4, and Xbox controllers—including the Xbox Elite Controller Series 2 and Adaptive Controller. So warm up your thumbs and get excited


Update Notes

The maintenance that commenced on 04/11/2021 08:00 PM (CST) has been completed.

Thank you for your patience.

Update Contents

  • map change
  • Issues Fixed
  • Irregular wall placements [Issues Fixed]
  • pick up phone {Issues Fixed}
  • glitched textures {Issues Fixed}
  • Dropping {Issues Fixed}
  • Dropping {Issues Fixed}
  • player stuck glitch

texture collisions fix
main menu fix


We hope you continue to enjoy NIGHTSHIFT.


About the Game

Welcome to nightshift! You are a retired Detective, and you get a note in your office from the police department but, upon the note you have to find out who murdered Kakig Kasajian but in the house it won't be easy to find the Killer. Now just remember, always look but never look in the past

This game is in Early Access


Game Icon made by RoGamxr#1663



“We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.” ― Bill Watterson

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 540 or AMD A6-3620 or higher
  • Memory: 346 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 1GB RAM (NVidia GeForce 460 or AMD Radeon 6850)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 346 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2300 or AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 368 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 368 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
